text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro, welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies.

Today, I am very excited, because we are going
to be making

something we’ve never made before. I have
been getting

requests for a very long time to do something
Sonic The Hedgehog.

And we all know Sonic loves his chili dogs,
so I thought, why not make

Sonic the Hedgehog a chili dog? And, make
some homemade onion rings, for the gold rings.
Yeah? Yeahhhh! Alright, so let’s get started!

We are gonna need a lot of different ingredients
today so I am just gonna

Explain how to make these as we go. The first
thing that we are going

To do is chop up our peppers, onions, and
mushrooms. Starting with our peppers,

We’re just going to cut these up, you can
cut them up any way you like,

but I am just going to show you how I like
to do it. Just cut it right down the middle

and then, you’re going to take out all the
middle part and the seeds. Once you’ve

Gutted the pepper just move the seeds off
to the side and then I like to flip them up
like this

and then you’re just going to cut them into
really thin slices. Now that we’ve got the peppers

sliced, you’re gonna flip them the other
way, and then you’re just going to dice
them up into little pieces.

Now we’re going to chop up our onion, you’re
going to need a half cup, but I’m just

gonna chop up the whole thing. I’m just
gonna cut off the front and the back, take
off the skin

Now you’re just going to cut slices this
way, then dice them this way.

Last thing that we’re gonna cut up are these
little mushrooms. And, it’s pretty easy,
you’re just going to take your knife and dice them.

Once you’ve got your veggies chopped up,
we’re going to head over to the stove.

We’re also going to bring one pound of fresh
ground beef, 8 ounces of your favorite barbecue
sauce, and one large can of crushed tomatoes.

First thing that you’re going to do is grease
your large skillet, then you’re going to
turn your

burner onto medium heat and pour in your ground
beef. You’re going to want to break it up,

I’m just using a wooden spoon so that the
meat will cook evenly. And, you’re going

to want to cook it until the meat turns completely
brown.

Once your meat has browned, you’re going
to add half a cup of those yummy peppers

we cut up, half a cup of onions and half a
cup of those mushrooms. Then add one large

can of crushed tomatoes, 8 ounces of barbecue sauce.
Now, stir everything together and reduce the
heat to low.

Place the lid on the top and let that chili
simmer for thirty minutes.

The chili is cooking on the stove and now
we’re going to make some onion rings, and
we’re going to start with the batter.

Add one cup of flower to your big bowl, then
one and a half teaspoon of baking powder,
one egg

one quarter teaspoon of salt, two thirds cup
of water, two tablespoons of vegetable oil.

Then you’re just going to take a whisk and
mix it all together.

Now I’m just going to hold in my tears and
cut rings.

So, you’re just going to take your onion,
put it on it’s side, just like this.

And then, you’re just going to cut slices,
and that will make some rings.

So after you’ve cut all these little onion
slices, all you do is just pop them out.

Just put a little pressure, pop pop, and look
at that, onion rings!

Now we’re just going to take our onion rings
and the batter over to the stove top.

In another skillet we’re going to pour oil
into the pan. You want to make sure there’s

about a half of an inch of oil. Then you’re
going to turn the heat dial to medium and

let the oil warm up. As soon as the oil is warm,
you’re going to dip the onion rings into
the batter

and then put them in the pan. They cook quickly,
so keep your eye on them. As soon as the

bottom turns golden brown flip them over,
and then when both sides are done put them
on a plate with a paper towel to pick up the excess oil.

Now to put it all together! We’ve got all
of the parts, we’ve got our fresh chili
right off the stove, it’s

still steaming and it smells so good! Oh I
can’t wait to eat this!

To assemble these you’re going to have a
hotdog bun, heat up a hotdog. You can use

any kind of dog that you like, whether it’s a veggie
dog, turkey dog, regular dog, whatever you fancy.

And then you’re going to take a scoop of
this chiliiiiiiii, so good! Put it on top.

Sonic puts a lot of chili on his chili dogs,
but you can do whatever you like.

I’m gonna put a bunch on there, oh yes!
So good!

Then a little bit of cheese and a little bit
more onion. And then, we’re going to top it off

with a green olive, it goes right in the middle
like that.
YUM YUM YUM YUM YUM YUM YUM YUM YUM !!!!!!!

And there we have it! Ta-daaa!!! Sonic the
Hedgehog Chili Dogs, and Onion Rings.

We got our gold rings over here. Thanks you
guys for suggesting something Sonic!

These were really fun to make, and these smell
so good! This is actually going to be
my dinner with my crew tonight, I’m so excited!

If you guys have any other ideas for any other
Nerdy Nummies please let me know.

Leave me a comment down below and I’ll do
my best to make it happen.

Also, you can follow me on Facebook, Tumblr,
Instagram, and Twitter… Did I say Twitter?
Oh Jeez.

If you guys make these, please send me photos,
I love seeing your baking creations.

It just makes my day happy, I love seeing
your creative side.
Alright, thanks again guys!
Bye-Bye!
Ohhhh my gosh! Alright, taste test.
mmmmmmmm…… mmmmmm.
Oh, that’s great.
Two thumbs up and a foot!
